page.title: 11CLUBS IN CLATFORD SCHOOL
page.content: The children from Clatford C.E.School go to quite a variety of {CLUBS}.Many{ {CHILDREN }go to clubs or societies in Goodworth Clatford or in {ANDOVER } itself.Near to the school is the Village Club which offers various facilities,for example Beavers,Cubs and Scouts for the boys of the village and surrounding areas. In a survey of Clatford children gymnastics proved the most popular club.Katherine Rogers in the top class is in the Hampshire {GYMNASTICS } squad.The school has two gymnastics clubs but the main one is at the Andover Sports Centre.The school also offers a number of other activities in the lunch hour such as football, netball,rounders,athletics,chess,cross country and music clubs,according to the season.Cycling Proficiency lessons are held annually after school.
